property.name: hashing.max.freq
property.description: Max frequency of a feature in each document to allow adding it to the hashed document.

property.name: hashing.binary.weights
property.description: true = ignore features frequencies and assume they all occured once in a document (ie. all have same wight within each document)

property.name: hashing.lonely.features
property.description: true = hash features appearing in only one document across the corpse (but keep its weight effect on that document).

property.name: hashing.md5.hash
property.description: true = md5 hash features instead of serial numbering

property.name: hashing.df.cut
property.description: fraction removed from popular features after sorting by popularity in HashMapper.java (eg.0.05 is top 5% popular features) [Elsayed ACL'08].

property.name: hashing.num.reducers
property.description: Default number of reducers in the job to hash vectors.

property.name: hashing.option.num
property.description: Options: (1)collect features (2) featureVectors (3) featureWeightVectors (5) bag of hashed words.DEFAULT:3
